error.message: Missing explicit access check on entity query.
Class Drupal\simple_global_filter\Event\UserSelectsEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

Parameter $event of method Drupal\simple_global_filter\EventSubscriber\InitSubscriber::setFilterIfInURL() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Missing explicit access check on entity query.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
